meanings.definition: A medical condition in which the thyroid gland does not produce enough hormones.
meanings.sent1: Hypothyroidism can cause tiredness and weight gain.
meanings.sent2: My aunt was diagnosed with hypothyroidism last year.
meanings.sent3: Even though it sounds funny, hypothyroidism is no joke.
meanings.sent4: Her sluggishness was like a shadow cast by hypothyroidism.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained hypothyroidism as a slow engine in the body.

meanings.definition: The state of having an underactive thyroid gland.
meanings.sent1: Treatment for hypothyroidism often involves medication.
meanings.sent2: She struggles with the symptoms of hypothyroidism daily.
meanings.sent3: The party was a disaster, a result of hypothyroidism in the planning committee.
meanings.sent4: His lack of energy was a clear sign of hypothyroidism.
meanings.sent5: The impact of hypothyroidism on her metabolism was profound.
